s3games.player

Class MonteCarloClassicPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.player.Player
      • s3games.player.AbstractMonteCarloPlayer
        • s3games.player.MonteCarloClassicPlayer

  • public class MonteCarloClassicPlayer
extends AbstractMonteCarloPlayer
    This is the default version of monte carlo player, it only looks at the number of won trials compared to the number of all trials

      we add 1, if we won

      the number of trials won against the total number of games
      protected void initializeRatio()
      classical monte-carlo has always ration 1.0

      before the first trial, reset the number of winning/other trials
